text: Di laangi e dahi, gei Deborah gaa hai dana hegau gi Barak, tama daane a Abinoam mai di waahale go Kedesh i Naphtali bolo gi hanimoi. Deborah ga helekai gi mee, “Dimaadua go di God o digau Israel gu gowadu gi di goe telekai deenei: ‘Lahia au daane e madangaholu mana (10,000) mai nia madawaawa Naphtali mo Zebulun, dagia digaula gi di Gonduu Tabor.
